DOC.brief_summary: The goal study determine whether timolol eye drop effective alleviate acute migraine headache . Subjects randomize receive either timolol eye drop placebo ( tear ) use migraine abortive medication .
DOC.brief_title: Timolol Eye Drops Treatment Acute Migraine Headache
DOC.criteria: Diagnosis migraine headache Exclusion Criteria Nonmigraine headache Use systemic betablocker Medical history hypotension , bradycardia , syncope significant cardiovascular disease Medical history difficulty breathing , asthma chronic obstructive pulmonary disease pulmonary disease Medical history glaucoma , ocular hypertension hypotony , punctual stenosis , current use ophthalmic medication Previous adverse reaction timolol betablockers Inability selfadminister eye drop due physical cognitive disorder Currently pregnant breastfeed Pregnant past year Nonenglish speaker
